data.text:
The Sercian DPR Ground Forces (SDPRGF) was also known as Sercian Armyare the land and ground forces and main branch of the Armed Forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Sercia are responsible for land and ground-based military operations. The formed from parts of the collapsing Republic of Sercia Army (1975-2010) under the Republic of Sercia Armed Forces in 2010. The formation of these forces posed economic challenges after the Dissolution of the Republic of Sercia, and required reforms to professionalize the force during the transition. The DPR Army was located the general headquarters and military camp bases in Voruta, Sercia DPR.

Since 2010, the Sercian DPR Army have all sizes of many millions of troops and military officials from mainland Sercia going to military occupation on abroad around in Few Europe, while remaining extensively committed to the Sercian DPR War on Genovia or Genovian-Sercian War or Sercian DPR Insurrection on Genovia (2020-Present) was the enemy against the Genovian and Coalition military forces.

History[]

The Republic of Sercia was dissolved of formerly constitutional republic, efforts were made to keep the Republic of Sercia Armed Forces as a single military structure for the new Constitution of the Sercian Nations and Democratic States. The last Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of Sercia, Minister Gustav Vanger is the former General and Military Commander of the Republic of Sercia Armed Forces was became as the appointed supreme commander of the newly CISNDS Armed Forces in 2010. Among the numerous treaties signed by all constitutions of the newly government under the unitary one-party socialist state, in order to direct the transition period, was a temporary agreement on general purpose forces, signed in Voruta in 2011. However, around the Mainland Sercia and Northwest Island was determined to undermine the concept of joint general purpose forces and form their own armed forces. The Government of Sercia moved to form its own DPR Armed Forces.

The Supreme Leader and President of the Democratic People's Republic of Sercia Terrence MacPherson and William MacPherson signed a decree forming the Sercian DPR Ministry of Defence in 2011, establishing the Army of the Democratic People's Republic of Sercia was known as Sercian DPR Army along with the other parts of the Sercian DPR Armed Forces. At that time, the General Staff was in the process around the military personnel around the three regions in Northern Sercia and Northwest Islands, Central Sercia and Southern Sercia around the boundaries of Baltic nations.
